name: Power UP! (BurnedTuner)
description:
A game for MMCS Game Jam 2022. Made with Unity 2020.3

Help a cute robot to power up all the computers. Solve puzzles by transfering electricity from one place to another. 

Controls:
Aim - Mouse
Shoot - Left Mouse Button

GitHub: https://github.com/BurnedTuner/smartest-machine
